description:
LABYRINTH....get lost!

Guide a steel ball through a maze of pits, walls and other obstacles. 

*Dodge the pits
*Roll along walls
*Avoid the spinning wheels of death
*Roll across power boost pads for a shot of speed
*Select unlocked levels by swiping left or right
*Unlock new levels by defeating them
*Select the difficulty by swiping up or down
*Hit the ominous black button for space mode graphics and physics 

** Realistic Sound Effects **
** More Levels **
** New Smoother Graphics **
** "RealTime" Physics Engine **
** Hours of Fun **
** Starts Out Easy **
** Last Few Levels Are "Near Impossible" **
** May Drive You to Madness **

Kyle B noted "Great game, hard, fun, and FREE"
Oleksiy S says "Game 5 star"
Joyce W reviewed it "Luv it luv it! One of my favorite apps"
And finally a special thanks to
Betty H who said "Haven't played it yet...just got it !" but left a 0 star review.  Thanks Betty H!

Email the developer pepelkod@mega-mouse.net with any questions or suggestions you may have.  If you defeat the last level email me and let me know how you did it.
